service_definition_overrides.Configurations/SVCConfiguration/Definiti: Radiometric Terrain Corrected (RTC) products in VH polarization over AOIs in China, Madagascar and Pakistan, generated from Sentinel-1 SAR imagery, processed by ASF.

Radiometric Terrain Corrected (RTC) products in VH polarization over AOIs in China, Madagascar and Pakistan, generated from Sentinel-1 SAR imagery, processed by ASF. Values for the VH (cross-polarized) polarization are generally driven by volume scattering, with more complex volume scatterers (such as dense vegetation) returning higher backscatter values. Surface water generally appears very dark, as it is predominantly a surface scatterer; most returns remain in the primary polarization.
RTC products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3 2022 using GAMMA software. Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data 2021-2022, processed by ESA.
service_definition_overrides.ItemInfo/Credits: RTC products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3 2022 using GAMMA software. Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data 2021-2022, processed by ESA.
